role.argrole: new state- sometimes marked by على

example.parse:
ARG1 is PP
(S-ADV (VP (PSEUDO_VERB لكن) (NP-SBJ-2 (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC العالم)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS بات) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-2)) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يجمع) (NP-SBJ-1 (-NONE- *)) (PP-CLR (PREP على) (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN دولة) (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN فلسطينية)) (ADJP (TYPO مستقل) (CONJ و) (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN حقيقية))))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: come together to see a real and independant Palestinian state

example.arg: يجمع * على دولة فلسطينية مستقل و حقيقية .

example.parse: (S (PP (PREP ك) (NP (DEM_PRON_MS ذلك))) (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تجمد) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC دفع) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN المستحقات))) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN صناديق) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN المدارس) (CONJ و) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN الثانويات))))) (SBAR-ADV (WHADVP-1 (REL_ADV حيث)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS باتت) (NP-SBJ (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM اعمال) (NP (POSS_PRON_3FS ها))) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM الاساسية))) (NP-PRD (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC شبه) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN مجمدة))) (ADVP (-NONE- *T*-1)))))) (PUNC .))

frameset.edef: to spend or pass the night

example.parse: بات اخي في بيت صديقه هربا من والدي

frameset.edef: to continue to do, to be absorbed in
